      static void main(String[] args) 
      static void nailMain(com.martiansoftware.nailgun.NGContext context)
      When running as a daemon in the NailGun server, nailMain(NGContext) is called instead of main(String[]) so that the given context can be used to listen for client disconnections and interrupt command processing when they occur.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)

      • nailMain

        public static void nailMain(com.martiansoftware.nailgun.NGContext context)
                     throws InterruptedException
        When running as a daemon in the NailGun server, nailMain(NGContext) is called instead of main(String[]) so that the given context can be used to listen for client disconnections and interrupt command processing when they occur.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
